newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Oct 7.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Oct 7.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning, although sharemarket activity is expected to be subdued due to public holidays in New South Wales, South Australia and the Australian Capital Territory.
Appliance maker said on Monday before the market opening in a reply to a query from the Australian Stock Exchange that it knew of no reason for the recent rise in its share price.
Shareholders in gold miner to vote on merger proposal with Ghana-based gold miner Ashanti Goldfields Co Ltd to create one of Africa's largest gold miners.

The head of Dutch post and telecoms giant Koninklijke PTT Nederland NV (KPN) said on Sunday the company would cooperate with Australian regulators into unusual options trading in TNT, before it launched a A$2.0 billion takeover bid for the Australian transport group last week.
Rupert Murdoch's media group wins Federal Court approval on Friday to launch its rebel Super League competition, which is seen as boost for its Australian pay television venture Foxtel.

Australian Competition and Consumer Commission (ACCC) approved on Friday the pay television operator's satellite infrastructure merger plan with Optus Vision and bond holders approve the group's recapitalisation plan.
